activities:
River is a leading provider of custom configured web-based social learning and development programs used by private businesses, government entities, and their employees.  We may collect, store, and use the following kinds of personal data:
(a) information about your visits to and use of our website;
(b) personal information (such as, First Name, Last Name, Business Email, Phone, Company, and Job Title) that you provide to us for the purpose of registering with us and/or subscribing to our website services and/or email notifications.
River only collects the information our Clients require to run an effective web based mentoring program, for example:
* Contact information
* Current job specific information
* Information about your education, experience, and knowledge
* Information about your learning and development needs
